headers.value: default-src 'self'; style-src 'self' *.tawk.to fonts.googleapis.com cdn.jsdelivr.net; script-src 'self' *.tawk.to cdn.jsdelivr.net; frame-src *.tawk.to; font-src *.tawk.to fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' *.tawk.to cdn.jsdelivr.net tawk.link s3.amazonaws.com; connect-src *; form-action *.tawk.to
